price: Nítorí náà, fi wọ́n sílẹ̀ títí wọn yóò fi bá ọjọ́ wọn tí wọn máa pa wọ́n sínú rẹ̀ pàdé.
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī fīhi yuṣ'ʿaqūna
